title: Was The ‘Deepest Hole on Earth’ Sealed After Finding ‘2 Billion Year Old Fossil’?
subtitle: There are two ways to get the answer to this question: Scrolling through an unreasonable number of photos in a clickbait article, or reading our quick answer here.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: The deepest hole on Earth was sealed after finding a fossil that is 2 billion years old.
